definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Please complete this declaration in BLOCK letters using black or blue pen.
sentences.chinese: 請用黑色或藍色筆以正楷填寫本聲明書。

sentences.english: The statement deferred to a change in policy.
sentences.chinese: 這聲明書是遵從政策的改變。

sentences.english: Claims will not be processed unless authorization and declaration are signed by the claimant.
sentences.chinese: 本公司祗接受已簽署授權書及聲明書之索償申請表。

sentences.english: She picked up the waiver and scanned it.
sentences.chinese: 瑪格麗特拿起棄權聲明書，掃視了一遍。

sentences.english: Please submit the completed advance return and declaration to the Returning Officer.
sentences.chinese: 請將填妥的預先申報書及聲明書交付予選舉主任。

sentences.english: Less 5% commission to be shown on separate statement only.
sentences.chinese: 5%的佣金用單獨的聲明書列出。

sentences.english: When completed, this return and declaration shall be submitted to the Chief Electoral Officer.
sentences.chinese: 請將填妥的申報書及聲明書向總選舉事務主任呈交。

definition: to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Da4 hui4
Quan2 min2 Jian4 kang1 Bao3 xian3
